thread.title: Dorese Clark
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Dorese Clark

author: Dorese Clark
title: Dorese Clark
text: My sales person was awesome I'm going thru cancer and needed a comfortable bed and I walked in to Gardner white at 8:45 pm at night they close at 9 pm my sales person stayed over just to help my find the right bed I got it delivered and it's perfect Tim Mayo I'll be seeing u again thank u so much for ur help
